text: Sometimes overhear electricians debate wiring flaws—free lessons but can't sleep!
Traffic here can be brutal - leaving home ten minutes earlier makes all difference between smooth sailing & STUCK FOREVER mode!
Talk about 'expected coffee addiction'... Jokes aside though we're more hands-on problem solvers than just theory heads!
Electric engineers are pegged as indoor cave dwellers soldered to their desks - true for crunch times but we thrive problem-solving out 'in the wild' too.
Multimeters everywhere—can't resist measuring stuff at home!
Had a buddy who once blew his budget on rare vintage vacuum tubes. Seemed nuts until he flipped them for triple - audio buffs dig that warm sound!
"Age ain't nothing but numbers; real change comes from actions."
Life teaches you partnership isn't just romance—it's dealing with taxes together at midnight after your favorite team lost!
Stability becomes more electric than fireworks eventually.
Later years definitely highlight companionship's comfort over sparks.
